name: Adventure House
description: The name of our interactive fiction game is “Adventure House”. We think about to tell a story that contain some adventure components and like to make the player who play our game feel attracted and surprised when they are doing “choice”. And the story of our game is that when the main character get awake, he was in a house that embraced by the forest. And then, he would like to do many choices to try to live. He will face different challenges, attractions and problems. The player is in the main character’s version to play this game. They will try to do the right choice to live to win this game.
